title: VERBATIM: Michael Cohen is 'radioactive' -Daniels' lawyer
text:
VERBATIM: Michael Cohen is 'radioactive' -Daniels' lawyer 1:20am BST - 01:26 
Adult-film actress Stormy Daniels and her attorney said on Monday that President Trump’s longtime personal lawyer Michael Cohen is ''radioactive'' and that anyone who's retained his services should be worried.   
Adult-film actress Stormy Daniels and her attorney said on Monday that President Trump’s longtime personal lawyer Michael Cohen is "radioactive" and that anyone who's retained his services should be worried.  //reut.rs/2J3Q1ou
